Right now, we're pushing forward, and that's the key is to push forward and to do things a little differently than the other guys, Steve Ballmer said. Comparisons are inevitable, though, and the horse race will be covered at length as the Windows Phone 7 handsets hit the market next month in time for holiday shopping.
